memberdef.argsstring: (struct weston_compositor *compositor, uint32_t mod)
memberdef.name: weston_install_debug_key_binding

briefdescription.para: Install the trigger binding for debug bindings.

detaileddescription.para:
compositor
The compositor.
mod
The modifier.
This will add a key binding for modifier+SHIFT+SPACE that will trigger debug key bindings.
